{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Edimax EW-7708Pn v1 top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = |caption2 = |pp = http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=224&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=44 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Edimax |model = EW-7708Pn |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 29, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_EW-7708Pn_v1 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 1814 |device_id = 0601 |subvendor_id = 1814 |subdevice_id = 2860 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9577080702 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:1F:1F,00:0E:2E |chip1 = Ralink;RT2860; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/20/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2T3R MIMO
This version has a flat top and no WPS button. The FCC test report lists the following models as identical.. *Edimax EW-7708Pn / GWA-H08n V1.0 (the GWA-H08n is/was common on eBay) *PCI GW-NS300N *Sitecom WL-180v1 *MINITAR MWNCB *Topcom Skyr@cer PC Card 3201n *JAHT WN-7300NP *MSI CB70SE Sold by QuickerTek as the [[QuickerTek nQuicky]]. "BL ML E18601 94V-0", "PN: 1244-00000513-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Edimax EW-7708Pn v1 top.jpg| File:Edimax EW-7708Pn v1 bot.jpg|
[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Ralink corp. RT2800 802.11n PCI [1814:0601]
        Subsystem: Ralink corp. Device [1814:2860]
        Flags: bus master, slow devsel, latency 64, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Kernel driver in use: rt2800pci
===rt2x00pci chip info dump=== 
[42578.696871] ieee80211 phy19: rt2x00_set_rt: Info - RT chipset 2860, rev 0102 detected
[42578.719862] ieee80211 phy19: rt2x00_set_rf: Info - RF chipset 0001 detected
